matkreduction: M. ATK Reduction Lv. 1/2/3: Reduces M. ATK by 35/x/x%
atkreduction: ATK Reduction Lv. 1/2/3: Reduces ATK by x/x/52%
atkincrease: ATK Increase Lv. 1/2/3/4/5: Increases by ATK 42/55/84/x/100%
matkincrease: M. ATK Reduction Lv 1/2/3/4: Reduces ATK by x/x/x/84%
critrateincrease: Crit % Increase Lv. 1/2/3/4: Increase Crit % by 14/18/22/26%
defincrease: DEF Increase Lv. 1/2/3: Increases DEF by x/140/175%
defreduction: DEF Reduction Lv. 1/2/3/4: Reduces DEF by x/50/60/70%
dpincrease: DP Increase Lv. 1/2/3/4: Increases DP by x/40/75%
poison: Poison: Takes damage equal to 5% of max HP at the start of the turn, up to 1 time
taunt: Taunt: Attacks the target with the effect.
weaponenhancement: Weapon Enhancement Lv. 1/2/3: Increases damage by 30/x/x%
stun: Stun: Target will be disabled and lose their turn
incapacitate: Incapacitate Lv. 1/2/3/4/5: Increases damage taken by 30/40/50/60/70%
burn: Burn: At the start of the turn, receive damage equal to [ATK: 15%, M. ATK: 15%], up to 3 times
bleed: Bleed: Takes damage equal to 5% of max HP at the start of the turn, up to 1 time
freeze: Freeze: Target will be disabled and will lose their next turn
defensivestance: Defensive Stance: Reduces damage taken by 50%.
statusailment: Status Ailment: Types of Status Ailment: Stun, Freeze, Transform
mark: Mark: Gains an additional turn after defeating a Marked enemy
continuousdamage: Continuous Damage: Types of Continuous Damage: Burn, Bleed, Poison, Shock
dpresreduction: DP Res. Reduction Lv. 1/2/3: Reduces DP Res. by x/x/35%
sever: Applies [Damage Increase] to self proportionate to your remaining HP (max 30%)
dmgresincrease: DMG RES. Increase Lv. 1/2/3: Increeases DMG RES. by: x/25/32%
dmgresreduction: DMG RES. Reduction Lv. 1/2/3: Increeases DMG RES. by: x/x/24%
protection: Protection: The selected friendly target cannot be targeted
shock: Shock: At the start of the turn, receive damage equal to [ATK: 15%, M. ATK: 15%], up to 3 times
defpenincrease: DEF PEN. Increase Lv. 1/2/3: Ignores x/x/30% of target's DEF when attacking
fortify: Fortify Lv. 1/2/3: Reduces damage taken by x/x/34%
allatkreduction: All ATK Reduction Lv. 1/2/3: Reduces all ATK by 23/x/x%
accincrease: ACC. Increase Lv. 1/2/3: Increeases ACC. by: x/25/x%
continuousrecovery: Continuous Recovery: Restores a certain amount of HP at the start of every turn
transform: Transform: Target will be disabled and lose their turn
summonclone: Summon clone: When using Mist Bullet, the clones will do damage equal to 35% of ATK and 35% of M. ATK
